metadata.title: RHSA-2024:9977: RHOSP 17.1.4 (python-zipp) security update (Moderate)
metadata.description:
A pathlib-compatible Zipfile object wrapper. A backport of the Path object.

Security Fix(es):

* Denial of Service (infinite loop) via crafted zip file in jaraco/zipp
(CVE-2024-5569)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS
score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE
page listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: github.com/jaraco/zipp: Denial of Service (infinite loop) via crafted zip file in jaraco/zipp

platform: Red Hat OpenStack Platform 17.1 for RHEL 9

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
python3-zipp is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
